data.text: THIS GAME IS SOOOOO ADDICTING!!!!!! I've literally played this game all night and there is two awesome versions. the adventure and the regular game and both are super fun and challenging as you keep playing. Plus a bonus game when you go to settings and hit more games that's also super cool and Tetris like. And there is no ads except when you run out of space and want to revive. Then you watch a short ad. I cannot recommend this game enough!!!

This game is literally so fun. If you are stressed it is the perfect way to calm down and relax. The only this is that it has ads, always containing ads after you play the game and run out of space. Also, I had to close out the game before it gave me the ad, and when I logged back in, it gave me the ad!

Small 9x9 board, hige blocks; game ends abruptly at odd pre-determined score level so ads can be served. lots of play stalls. unchallenging/boring. Sometimes restarts with an already-full board, gives a "no spaces available" message, anx jumps immed. into another 2nd repeat ad. Too much waiting time. Avoid. I uninstalled.

Started out great. Loved figuring out strategy. However, now am getting frustrated with the ads. There are 2 types that ruin the game completely...goes to a black screen and can't do anything but get out and start all over, and the other one is the video commercials that go to a gray screen with 'learn more' in center of screen then a small x finally shows up on corner. No matter how many times you tap the x nothing happens. If you keep tapping it eventually will go back to the game.

Fun but problematic. The gameplay is fine, but the ads keep messing it up. Some ads will just be a black screen, no getting out of it. so I have to exit and wait a bit before I can play again. I've encountered a few ads that never have a x option, so again, I have to close the game and wait. If they get better ads, I'll bump up the stars because it really is a fun game.

Love the game, but please fix the problem with the black screen ads. It's very frustrating to watch an ad to revive a level only to have the screen turn black, freeze and force you to close and reopen the app - which then brings you to that same level saying you ran out of space. If it's not fixed soon I will be uninstalling and downgrading my rating.

Cool game, a little less frustrating than Tetris bcos you can place your blocks anywhere on the screen in an available place. Even halfway up the board. Excellent time consuming game. I'm sorry, but I feel compelled to change my review. There are WAY TOO MANY ADS on this game. Ads after every single round..it's annoying. I can't continue playing this.. uninstalled.

Yet another SCAM game. Absolutely nothing good to say about it. NOT fun at all because far too many ads. Far too many glitches. Every 1 or 2 moves and then an ad. Keeps freezing and you must close and reopen. Pay outs decline the longer you play. Played continuously to reach 1000 to cash out and then must play another 35 mins on the hopes that you can cash out. Waste of time. I am uninstalling immediately!

Yet again, a game that is not what's advertise. I literally only downloaded it to try the nice tetris concept from the ad but that game doesnt exist. Instead, you have the same static tetris as any other app. Really sad that that's our game industry nowaday. You can do better, we can all do better. Like the game in the ad is not even that hard to code, they just really didnt make that game but to have the ad they had to at least make a 10 second clip so its just insane we dont have that game 🤯

I really enjoy this game, but as the other reviews say you lose, watch an ad, you win watch an ad. And what really bothers me is when the app auto downloads apps to my phone without my permission. Note to the developers: I make a point to immediately delete any game you auto download to my phone, so your tactics are definitely not working.

When I first started playing this game, it seemed like a reasonable challenge to get to the high score that I got. But now there's a strong sense that the game, and not random chance, controls the outcome, selecting the shapes that will force me to forfeit my game and have to watch an ad. The update change the parameters in their favor, to control the game even more, forcing a forfeit even sooner, and more ad revenues for them--but not from me! Uninstalled!

This game is actually fun to play as the adds say, it is also very colorful, overall the game would be a 9/10 just because there is too much adds in the game, and if I want to keep up with the events then I need internet, so that is the only con of this game. This game is also so colorful that sometimes you won't even know that you would blast some blocks😂

I hate how you are not actually touching the pieces with your finger to move them. You click the piece and it floats a few centimeters ahead of your finger. It's hard to place the blocks. Also way too many ads.

I really enjoyed this game but I'm giving up due to the way it's deliberately programmed to force you to watch ads to continue. It starts off giving you an easy to get points, then it is interesting/challenging for a short while. But when you get around 3000 points, it throws out impossible sets of blocks, the only way to continue is to get (cheating) rewards by watching ads. I'd prefer to just play it straight and not be controlled and patronised, thanks! Such a shame.

Yet another game in which the ad for gameplay is not what the game is. It's a very cool strategy game but it is not Tetris -like with pieces coming into the screen to put into play. You choose where to place pieces from start to finish. Frustrating to finally choose to play and it's nothing like implied. Debating on keeping or not as it is, as stated, a cool strategy game

It's basically an ad feed with a gaming front end. It will purposely feed you all the pieces you need to complete whatever row you need to complete until it's ready to feed you an ad, and then it is programmed to feed you pieces to make you lose. I've tested it over and over, and that's its exact behavior every time. Uninstalled.

3 things: 1. I would like to be able to choose the level of difficulty. Sometimes you don't Want to constantly be challenged, but just need a distraction. It's also good to offer level choices for all walks of life & abilities. 2. I'd like to be able to rotate the pieces 3. There's a glitch in the program in the Adventure choice-- from time to time- it resets itself and starts you back at level 1.

Alrighty, great graphics, decent gameplay. Hell with these ads. I'm going to make this very simple. Allow me to pay $3 to get rid of these ads or I'm deleting this. An ad should be no more than 5 seconds with an option to skip forward. No ad should be able to hijack my device rendering it useless until the damn thing finishes. Worse is the false starts. Black screen making me force close the app is just as unacceptable as a 2 minute ad

It gets two stars because I've spent a lot of time playing it, trying to beat high scores of coworkers! That being said I don't believe this is fairly competitive at all. It is made to get ad views not to be the next big competitive game. It is not random which is a shame Still not a bad game and if you turn on airplay mode before playing (turn it off right after) you avoid the commercials which are predatory and misleading. You do lose your chance to revive but it's not that serious.

Tis an alg game, graphics and colours good. There is a few things that could improve the game and overall experience of game play. In the 'adventure' you complete it but don't get to keep the trophy. There's no achievements or record of adventure completions. Online mode would be good, being able to compete against other people

I like the game play but as others have said it is severely rigged for the ad revenue. I have gotten to the last level of adventure mode 4 times only to have time run out. The level is impossible with the blocks that get sent out, not random, they are the blocks you don't need over and over and over. If a game frustrates you more than it is fun why play it!

I like the game, but when you play the adventure mode, after a few games. You go back to play that mode ,it erased your history and had to start all over again !! I noticed there a new update. Hopefully, that fixes that problem. Or delete the game !!!!!!!!!!! After the update, it didn't fix problems . Disappointing. I deleted your game.

Was a decent game. But latest update makes ads start before the game over sound even finishes and the revive timer moves twice as fast. Ads displayed are also very disturbing now, suggesting company supports weaponized political terrorism. Not something I can support.

The first time I scored out of level 77, I was placed back into level 1. Then it took me a week to get back up to level 77 and I think I made it to level 82 when AGAIN I was set back to level 1. The game is also rigged so you do well at first and then the blocks offered are not at all what you need. The shapes are not given.randomly. Somebody needs to fix this app. I'm going to delete it now and find another app to distract me when I start crying about my dead doggie.

Ads are to much! Free games come with ads but this is so over the top for frequency, Not to mention after watching the same one over and over and over again. If I have a bad couple games I might have to watch the same 45 sec ad 3 times in less than 5 mins.

The ads are out of control. Lose a level = AD. Win a level = AD. It is the worst ad game I have ever been subject to. Some of the ads are a minute long and no way to stop the madness. Would be a fun game if I I didn't become enraged at the ads. More ad time than play time!!!

Fun to play, but waaaayy too many ads that last for too long. Some auto install apps. Shame! Some don't work properly, so you have to shut down the game and restart it. Your Pinterest ads stink. They don't go away, and then your game has to be restarted.

The game is very entertaining for all ages. While there are a lot of ads, that is tolerable. My only complaint is that when playing the game, the game will provide 3 blocks in which you have to strategically place them in certain positions in order to beat the level. In this case there was no way to beat the game because the 3 blocks could not be solved no matter the position. I took a screenshot as proof although I don't think reviews will allow there to be a picture attached. Do not recommend.

Soooo many ads! It's pretty bad when some of the ads automatically download games without you giving permission to do so. The "continue" option is a joke! You watch an ad, then it gives you pieces you'd never be able to use. It was a fun game at first, but now it's just frustrating.

Ad after ad after ad. Play for 10 seconds then an ad. Play another 10 seconds then an ad. Then if you're lucky you can play if yet another ad doesn't pop up. Used to be a fun game but the ads are ridiculous. Uninstaller app now.
I understand that ads are a part of all games, but the ads shut the game down. Screen goes black and you need to exit the game and when logging back on lose your progress! Please fix!!!!!

ADS....ADS.....ADS......The game itself is good. Keeps your mind busy. The ads are ridiculous! There is no option to get this game ad free. What a shame! This game would be even better and get more stars if it was ad free.
Too many ads. This is not random. At first is easy, but after a while you got stuck, no matter what and to continue you have to watch an add, of course. This is cheating. Uninstalled.

I am now addicted, I'm good too you should use some of my game play for your ads. I already got 4 other people to download and play the game just wanted to beat my score. They are now addicted. Update: I have lost the crown and regained it from my friends I invited, they got good but I've gotten better, you should use some of my gameplay for the next game promotion event.my friends are holding the winning score from the friends they all invited to beat their scores. They are now addicted.

Game is severely rigged. Tried campaign mode and ended up on level 48. After a good point you are able to pass but even if you strategize perfectly they will spy on you and proceed to place blocks that end your game for the ad revenue. I used an ad block

ADS, ADS, and more ADS! The game was a cool time killer for me, before the last update and more ADS happened. Uninstalling this app, no need to have it taking up space! I get that this is a free game, and ADS kinda helps the developers but before, after, and during the game is crazy.

The game itself is fun but the ads are ridiculous. When I first started playing it was tolerable but now they are allowing ads that will automatically download an app to your phone without your permission! Also some of the ads are forcing the volume of your phone to turn on. Just give us a pay option to get rid of ads.

Another game that isn't what the advertisement showed us. How can companies be allowed to lie like this? They show one product but that's not what the product actually is. Isn't that false advertisement? The game on its own is just ok. I wish we could see the next set of blocks that we're getting so we can have some actual strategy instead of hoping that the next pieces fit the pieces we just placed.

The game seems designed to provide you with scheduled dopamine hits and as such the randomization appears to be difficult, if not impossible, for a few rounds then absurdly easy the next. Every few tries you are given ads and to continue without failure you also watch an ad. This app is definitely an ad revenue engine, not a game. I recommend avoiding it. Furthermore, many clones exist on the store reinforcing this concept.

It's a great game, with 30 to 40 second ads, at every corner. You lose, there's an ad, you win, there's an ad, you get a new high score, you're rewarded with an ad. My all time favorite is the black screen they give you when you're given a revive and you have no choice but to reset the game, losing all of your progress🤨

Good game ruined by advertisements. Whether you win or lose is irrelevant, you will be bombarded with advertisements after every level. Some are timed so they can last a while. And it is always the same few advertisements. Need either fewer advertisements or a paid option to make this game playable

The only reason I m not giving 5 star review is because although The game is very good and You don't get bored, but the ads are overwhelmingly annoying. Highly frequent. After each game you get an ad which you can't exit from and even when the ads give the option to skip its slammed in the corner so much that u can't properly touch it. Apart from it, the game is awesome

Fun, challenging puzzle game. I play it daily. It has two styles: classic and adventure. It's not timed, so it's not as stressful as Tetris. There's a video ad between each level. After several levels, the game also allows one chance per level to "revive" instead of admitting defeat. If ads get too long, I just close the game and play something else.

The game is amazing! It's like a better version of Tetris. Much better. The ads completely ruin the experience, though. You can't get out of them, even if the ad is for a game you've already downloaded or have proceeded to download. Advertisers are wasting funds by irritating players, and the gaming team is hurting a perfectly good game that took time and creativity to build. Everyone is losing here.

I could play this game for hours, but there are a few annoyances. Now I understand companies need to have ads in order to generate more sales, but this game is trying to shove "royal match" down my throat! The ads go for way too long, and that actually forces me to end the game because im bored waiting to get back to it. I wish there was a back button or something to that effect where if I place a tile and immediately regret it there's no way of going back. Otherwise fun challenging game.

Game could be a fun way to pass the time but the ads are ridiculous. There's an ad before and after the game, win or lose. There's ads to revive that will automatically download games to your phone when you try and close them, there'll be long ads that end and don't give option to close until it sits on your phone for another full minute, and there are ads that just crash and make you restart another one. There is also no reward system and will intentionally make you lose to watch ads.

I never give 5 stars but this game deserves every one of them! It's thought provoking, & although it restarts you sometimes (developers fix that please), it's so fun and let me tell you about the ads... they let you skip the ads after 3 seconds, yes, you read that right, THREE seconds! Try this game it's great!!!

Good game riddled with Ads. Like the game a lot. Can play offline which is very good. What is bad is the ads we get after every turn. The first few times, it was so that I only got ads when clicking the "revive" button, now ads come on the screen even when I don't press it. Unnecessary Ads ruin a good game and this is a prime example. Would have given it a 5 star otherwise.

There are SO MANY ADS! Ads if you pass a level, ads if you want to continue in a level, ads if you fail a level, and there is an ad that is always at the bottom of the play screen. So incredibly excessive. Also, every time an ad plays, any tap on the screen automatically starts the install of the advertised games. In 10 minutes, I had 3 new games installed, despite tapping cancel each time. Absolutely ridiculous. I've uninstalled this game. Feels too much like spyware/adware to me.

Game was fun and makes you think of where to place pieces in advance but I'm now stuck on Adventure level 84, I'll have a lot of empty spaces left and the game will end saying no spaces left. Contacted support and no reply Update 3/15/24 - lowered from 2 stars to 1, wish I could give them 0 stars. Again, had 57 empty spaces, only 7 used. Had a straight 3 block piece, a 4 block square and a 3 block L shaped piece, plenty of room and the game ends. Have screenshot for support but no reply, uninst

This game can be a delight to play... Until the "black screen" ads start. There is a chance to revive the play level only to see a black screen. When this happens, there are two options: close out the game and reopen or wait for the "x" to appear to return to the revived game. Only option: the level starts over. Ads can be unpleasant to sit through, but that's how bills are paid & keeps app free for consumers, I get it, but it's annoying to have the chance to revive but be forced to restart!

Thinking about deleting it because it starts over with a new game after so many days, and then you have to build it up again. We should be able to complete the entire pozzle without time limit before moving on to a new one.
So. Many. Adds. I definitely love the games and the challenges; especially the time frame to beat it in but the adds are relentless, and it's legitimately the only fault.

Love the game! It's very fun and intriguing! Perfect for kids and family and a great puzzle to test your brain! What I also like is how it keeps your combo for some time and how it gives certain blocks that are needed and you figure out where it goes! There are almost NO ads at all! (There are a few at the bottom that stay there but they never get in the way during gameplay unless you have accidentally pressed on it!) This is a perfect game! Totally recommended if you are very bored!

This game has a cool concept of being like tetris but having the ability to have free movement with the blocks, I like to play classic and at first, the game seems to guide you to get a decent score, then once you pass a certain score. It purposely rigs the blocks in order to get you to lose. The most annoying feature I've probably seen is the 3 by 3 block, because it's pretty much a death trap if you have limited space. If you can fix these problems, the game would be better.
The game itself is fun. The problem is there are ads after everything. Win. Ad. Lose. Ad. Don't fully exit the game when you lose, it'll pick up where you left off then you guessed it. Ad.

I was enjoying this but it doesn't always advance after I have finished a level. I'm playing the challenge style and it's keep resetting me to the same levels several times. It's maddening. I thought it wouldn't bother me but it so does. How many times can I replay level 56???? But I did enjoy it when it advanced. I'll uninstall and look for something similar that actually works.

I will literally pay money to not have ads! Edit: Instead of adding any sort of in-app purchases, they ramped up the ads to 2 even if you succeeded on a level. I will be uninstalling as it is not work sitting through two ads, whether or not that can be skipped, just to play one level. Moved to 1 star for this.

Just pushes ads. It forces you to either watch ads to "revive" or restart the whole round. I have experience with other similar games that also push ads in this way. I am not going to waste my time trying over and over again and I am definitely not going to be wasting time on a game where the only way to win is to watch 45 to 60 second ads just to continue. 1 Star. Uninstalling. No emailing between me and developers is needed. Just read this review.

Between the ads and the s%$#y pieces they give, once you get close to finishing a adventure they give you pieces that don't fit...there for, starting over again for the 10th time. A complete waist of your time for that you get (2) stars. Thanks for nothing!!

Its a really fun game but ads for revives and ands just to continue... it is sad because i would see myself spending 2 bucks or something to remove the ads on here mindlessly. But man ive never seen a single game promote one single game so hard in my life. You guys REALLY want me to install match royale. (I will not) so yeah, 2 star because the games actually fun but ads killed it. I'm uninstalling it sadly as there's no way to get rid of them.

The app is designed very poorly it is not random and it has a celling . In other words you will get to a point of no improvement quickly and stay there indefinitely. It's designed to force a lose at certain levels...

Absolutely love the game itself... but the ads are insanely excessive, and ridiculously long... not to mention they open up multiple tabs without you clicking anything and a lot of them have fake Xs in the corner to make you think you're closing it but you're actually clicking the ad. Probably going to Uninstall

A fun enough game, but uses HUGE amounts of data for no explicable reason, and advertising is merciless. Lost a game? Punishment is an ad. Won a game? Reward is... an ad. Give me an option to use Wi-fi connections only and I will upgrade to four stars.

Could be good but...... ads There are sooooo many ads it makes it annoying. I searched it o the play store to find an ad free version. Since there isn't one, I think I may just give up this game. There are enough similar without the excessive ads.

The absolute worst. No gameplay at all - you add blocks to a grid until you can't add any. Your five year old could code this in chat gpt in under 2 hours while also doing their homework. However, the kicker are the ads. My god, the ads. You get 20 seconds of gameplay before the 1st X to close the ad, then another 20 seconds of a page with the game title before the 2nd X. And I can swear on anything holy that they made the X button smaller so you tap the ad instead. Worse than watching paint dry

Game is great, until you're almost finished with adventure mode. I have been stuck on level 81 for 3 days and the game only gives you 6 days total to finish the adventure "puzzle". As others have said the block selection is definitely not random. I don't mind the ads so much but there are a lot of them.

Game is very fun and all but it's starting to glitch every time I put a block on the grid to match with the other colors the blocks disappeared off the screen and then it'll come back outt nowhere I'm deleting this game the glitches needs to be fixed for this game I don't know why it's doing that but it never did that before

A fun way to challenge yourself, but all the fake ads are off putting. Targeting people. Especially the fake weight loss. Obviously game lacks respect in its player to allow them to be targeted. Do not tap on any, or you will get multiple ads from all over. Looking for a challenging game without fake ads

It is so fun! I saw it on a YouTube short by Daniel Thrasher. And I rarely (never) get an app because an "influencer" does an ad for it but... this one just looked right for me. Daniel Thrasher should definitely be asked to do more ads because he did it right.

Disappointing This is a puzzle game that is similar to tetris. It's challenging with different levels that you try to complete, especially if you do Adventure mode. Well, today I am very disappointed that I made it to level 43, and now I'm back to zero. The game should let you continue to advance once you pass a certain level instead of restarting every single week having to go through the same levels. I may be removing this app and trying something different.

I dont mind the ads much because i only get them every few matches. However, the game is rigged to make you lose a lot. And the only way to bypass is watching ads. Then the ads/rigged nature of the game becomes too much. Id rather play a few bucks to own the game than play a rigged game that pushes ads.
I don't like the fact that the Adventure mode resets every few days. Apart from that, graphics are good and adverts frequency fair.

You can play offline so you can't get ads but Yeah everything you die you get an ad , This Game LOOKS nothing like the ad they promote the game with , in classical you start off with block already place and once I could just put 1 block and it was already game over , the game is fun overall

I really enjoy playing this game but the constant ads are driving me crazy. Watch a video/ad to revive if you run out of space. I don't want to revive but then it makes me watch a video/ad anyway. Everytime. Even if I hit replay to start a game again, another ad. After each level, another ad. It's actually ridiculous how many ads there are considering. I enjoyed the game but I won't be keeping it for much longer if these ads are going to continue it's spoiling the game experience.

This game uses an algorithm to set up your next three blocks, and that algorithm can and will completely tank your game in order to get more ads. This becomes more and more apparent as you play adventure mode. There is no monetization Model. It's completely ad driven. You get an ad when you win, and when you lose. It's an unusual way to do things. It would have been more profitable to make the game fair, but cost a small fee for no ads.

Fun game, but if you play the "Adventure" rounds, be aware that the last round is usually unsolvable, which forces you to watch an extra advertisement in order to "revive" the round. The blocks provided towards the end of the last round are deliberately intended to brick up the screen. Rather disappointing and unnecessary, as there are already so many ads it's annoying. I am already looking for an alternative bridks game that's less likely to cheat me.

So the ad that I clicked on was a classic tetris style game where a piece starts at the top and you have to drop it into the grid to make lines disappear- this game is nothing like that. Yes it has tetris shapes but that's where the similarity ends. It's a simple 8x8 grid and you get 3 pieces at a time to fit into the grid, oh and you can't rotate them. There is no challenge. It never gets harder or faster.

I love this game! It's so fun, no extra gimmicks. Just a fun challenging game to pass the time. My only complaint is that when I do adventure mode I keep losing my progress. I got all the way to level 41 this morning and just went to play level 42 and I was kicked all the way back to level 1. It's super annoying and not the first time it's happened. If I didn't lose my progress I would give 5 stars.

Great relaxing block puzzle game. I love it. Not sure how it happened, but (I think this is the game I originally picked. Oddly enough ( my fault or whatever) I was playing a game called Color Blast:Block Puzzle Game (exactly the spelling) which constantly crashed, but same type of game play. I deleted it to reinstall through Google games, and it wasn't there. Instead this one was there that looked the same except for the spelling. Odd right? So far this one works good. (NOTE:Works great love it
data.replyText: Thank you for liking our game, Color Blast is copied from us.

data.text: Oh lord! The ads are absolutely ridiculous in this game. There are so many it hinders a person from wanting to even play. It really isn't enjoyable when every move has an ad. Some you can skip, but most are half a minute long. Don't bother downloading this one... Geeze

I really love this game. The down part about it is the constant ADS after EVERY SINGLE ROUND. I understand ads make you money, but it is kinda like watching a movie that keeps getting interrupted every 2 minutes with an ad! Too much! It makes me disinterested in playing. I think I may delete this game just like I delete so many others that just have too many annoying ads!

It's very fun but, way, Way, WAY too many advertisements! The bad thing is they freeze up the screen, but the WORST thing is they automatically download their apps onto your phone If you watch it to revise your game. THEN you have to delete them all! Takes up space on my phone I need! That is so extremely annoying that I'm taking the game off.

The game is fun and time flies by like you wouldn't believe. You do not need internet to play. HOWEVER. The game gets very easy after you watch some ads. Before that the game feels like it is going out of its way to give you pieces that do not fit. The programming on this game is not subtle about it. You clearly see it coming a mile away. Edit: Had to bump down the review to 2 stars after level 48 on the adventure puzzles. The entire thing is setup to fail multiple times no matter what.

The adds ate not the worst part. It is when playing the adventure and you rea h a level and suddenly you are back to level 1 and have to start over. Why try for a trophy if you can never get there. I have been reset to level from level 28, 40, 435, 53,80 and as high as 95. Almost done and suddenly sorry you can't finish you have to start over. You owe me a new phone on that one . YOU GOTT TO BE JOKING, NO!. Please fix this bug.

My favourite offline game. You can play offline or online, in online you only get ads after the round is over, you will never get one during it. The only negative thing is, the levels don't get harder so I think a section of levels should be added, but keep the other thing aswell. In summary, a really good game and I find it so fun, you should download!

The Adventure block is great. Lets you play and doesn't give any issues with progress. However when you play all of those you HAVE to play the classic version and that? Is far from even a decent game. It presets the first stages , most of them are so wonky that the pieces they give you wont fit but one way , so redoing the level ends the same Everytime. Then when you die it makes you watch adds to revive but that doesn't help because the revive level gives the same 3 pieces that only fit 1 way.

BOOOO!! BRING BACK FREEPLAY CLASSIC! Okay I USED to love this game, I don't even mind the ads because it's addicting and fun. BUT the newest update to the classic mode (where you usually start with a completely blank board) now has a shape you start out with. If I wanted that I'd do adventure mode that's LITERALLY THE WHOLE POINT OF HAVING TWO MODES! ugh I'm sorry but it makes me not wanna play it's so frustrating. 👎👎👎

Seeing this advertised through another app, it looked different to other games of the same type. I downloaded it because I thought it was different. It turns out the video showing this game was false advertising and gameplay is nothing like advertised. It's a shame I can't delete the game from all app stores. Shame on yous.

Too many ads! It sucks. When you get to the 'so-called difficult levels', the pieces are not random difficult they are based on what space you have and the game generates the exact opposite pieces to the point of making it impossible to make a play. Just so it can play you an advert, rubbish! That's why I do not play it anymore. It's not challenging intellectually, 'it's play me for 5mins and I'll play you an Ad'.

I don't usually rate apps, but this one has been really horrible to use. There is an ad every time you have a go, and the ads are for the same thing that you have seen a thousand times before. They are really hard to get out of, so the UX is ruined by it. It is a really fun game, but it is just an example of complete and utter overkill of advertising that more frustrates users than entices them to download the app being advertised.

Game itself is SO fun! Exactly my cup of tea. Like others though, the ads after every single game is a lot. Especially when I lose after just a few mins. It feels like back to back ads a lot of the time. I'm actually only posting because I came to this app in the app store to see if there was a similar game that maybe had less ads. If ads were once every 20-30 mins of continuous gameplay I'd be happier. At this rate I'd rather pay the devs a 1 time purchase to not have ads.

The constant ads are horrendous, whether you win or lose there will be an ad. I could understand maybe every 3 or 4 lost levels but this game is EVERY LOSS. If you win 2 levels in a row...BAM an ad and to add insult to injury it's the same ads on repeat. Life is too short I have to delete before I see one more homescapes or monopoly add FFS.

Love the game but time spent on each puzzle is a minute or so, but the ad content is much longer than actual game play. It's almost to the point of uninstalling. And if I mute the game, ads should be too. I like to listen to my podcast as I play. This overrides my audio. Then I've found trying to close out the ad content actually installs them too. I had to remove 12 games I didn't install, but were all ads for Block Blast.

This was fun until it wasn't. The amount of ads are ridiculous. The publisher would probably be able to make a lot more money to offer players a one time charge for no ads. After the Feb 2024 update, the "Classic" game is no fun anymore not beginning as a blank board. Starting with a design to clear is no different than the goals of "Adventure" board. Another company that "updated" a game in the wrong way. It's a shame. Uninstalling.

This game should be called "Ad Blast". Full screen 30secs+ ads automatically show up in the middle of making critical moves, causing the game to hang/pause for milliseconds in other to redirect you to the ad... When you're back, best believe you'd make a wrong move/shake. It doesn't also blur out tiles that have no possible position to fix them in the board. NOT RECOMMENDED.

I thought I had seen unbridled greed because. of excessive ads but this one blows all others out of the water. There's no way to maintain concentration when There's an ad after every play. UNINSTALLED. And it was NOT the game I intended to download-it was switched at installation. This one's a TOTAL MISTAKE.

Not enough ads. The constant ads at the bottom, and the ads between every round,aren't enough. You should add more ads. Maybe,every click,then an ad. Better yet, just make it all ads, no game, just ads. Also, I really enjoyed installing this app, only to have 3 other useless apps installed.

It is my conjecture that this game is rigged by the developer to only allow you to reach a certain level (+/- 2,000) points before throwing a combination of blocks at you that makes any move lead to the end of the game and one of the verdamnt ads. The proof is that at the beginning of the game, the logarithm actually gives you the blocks you need no matter how clumsy you are, only to turn on you after a minute or two, just long enough to make you endure yet another ad.

It was fun till they switched it up. You had the chance to decide between adventure (where you had a given puzzle to fix) or classic (where it was a complete clean slate) and now it's both puzzles which kinda ruined it for me cause I liked classic. It was fun to play. Now it's just... Why have two different options but have to same outcome lol. Idk why they changed it. But 2 stars for the memories cause I'm uninstalling
